casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antwaun SIMS 297PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2019 David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, Ben Finholt, Attorney at Law, for Sims, Antwaun Kyral. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*580The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of March 2019 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of March 2019."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 10th day of April 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
